columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the cluster parameter group.

columns.name: description
columns.description: The description of the parameter group.

columns.name: family
columns.description: The name of the cluster parameter group family that this cluster parameter group is compatible with.

columns.name: parameters
columns.description: A list of Parameter instances. Each instance lists the parameters of one cluster parameter group.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags assigned to the parameter group.
